
```{r strata-names-for-user}
strat_text <- dplyr::case_when(
  strat == "age_group" ~ "agegroup",
  TRUE ~ strat
)
```


## Signals stratified by `r strat_text`

```{r signals-strat-text, results='asis'}
results_analysis <- signals_agg %>%
  dplyr::filter(any_alarms, category %in% strat)

stringr::str_glue(
  "When stratifying by {strat_text}, the {names(params$method)} algorithm detects ",
  "{sum(results_analysis$n_alarms)} signal{ifelse(sum(results_analysis$n_alarms) == 1, '', 's')} in the signal detection period."
)
```

```{r compute-pages}
df <- signals_padded %>%
  dplyr::filter(category %in% strat) %>%
  SignalDetectionTool:::create_factor_with_unknown()

number_stratum <- dplyr::n_distinct(df$stratum)

if (number_stratum <= 10) {
  p_height <- ceiling(dplyr::n_distinct(df$stratum) / 2) * 2
} else {
  p_height <- 12
}

pages <- ceiling(number_stratum / 12)
format <- knitr::opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to")
eval_paginate <- !grepl("html", format, ignore.case = TRUE)

txt <- NULL
```


```{r plot-timeseries-overall}
#| eval= !eval_paginate,
#| fig.cap=paste0("Number of ", params$disease, " cases by week and signals stratified by ", strat_text, ", ", params$country),
#| fig.dim = c(8, number_stratum),
#| fig.fullwidth=TRUE

plot_time_series(df,
  number_of_weeks = 52,
  intervention_date = params$intervention_date,
  interactive = FALSE
) +
  ggplot2::facet_wrap(~stratum,
    ncol = 2,
    scales = "free_y",
    drop = FALSE
  ) +
  ggplot2::scale_x_date(
    date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels = "%Y-%m-%d",
    expand = c(0, 0)
  )
```

```{r plot-timeseries-stratified, results='asis'}
#| eval= eval_paginate,
#| fig.cap=paste0("Number of ", params$disease, " cases by week and signals stratified by ", strat_text, ", ", params$country),
#| fig.dim = c(8, p_height),
#| fig.fullwidth=TRUE

for (i in seq_len(pages)) {
  p <- plot_time_series(df,
    number_of_weeks = 52,
    intervention_date = params$intervention_date,
    interactive = FALSE
  ) +
    ggforce::facet_wrap_paginate(~stratum,
      ncol = 2,
      nrow = 6,
      scales = "free_y",
      page = i,
      drop = FALSE
    ) +
    ggplot2::scale_x_date(
      date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels = "%Y-%m-%d",
      expand = c(0, 0)
    )

  print(p)
}
```
